name: Clefable
Attack1Text: Choose 1 of the Defending Pokemon's attacks. Metronome copies that attack except for its Energy costs and anything else required in order to use that attack, such as discarding Energy cards. (No matter what type the Defending Pokemon is, Clefable's type is still Colorless.)
Attack2Text: All damage done by attacks to Clefable during your opponent's next turn is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Electrode
Attack2Text: If the Defending Pokemon isn't Colorless, this attack does 10 damage to each Benched Pokemon of the same type as the Defending Pokemon (including your own).

name: Flareon
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage; if tails, this attack does 10 damage.
Attack2Text: Discard 1 Fire Energy card attached to Flareon in order to use this attack.

name: Jolteon
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage; if tails, this attack does 10 damage.
Attack2Text: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

name: Kangaskhan
Attack1Text: Draw a card.
Attack2Text: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

name: Mr. Mime
AbilityText: Whenever an attack (including your own) does 30 or more damage to Mr. Mime (after applying Weakness and Resistance), prevent that damage. (Any other effects of attacks still happen.) This power can't be used if Mr. Mime is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.
Attack1Text: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on the Defending Pokemon.

name: Nidoqueen
Attack1Text: Does 20 damage plus 20 more damage for each Nidoking you have in play.

name: Pidgeot
Attack2Text: Unless this attack Knocks Out the Defending Pokemon, return the Defending Pokemon and all cards attached to it to your opponent's hand.

name: Pinsir
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Scyther
Attack1Text: During your next turn, Scyther's Slash attack's base damage is 60 instead of 30.

name: Snorlax
AbilityText: Snorlax can't become Asleep, Confused, Paralyzed, or Poisoned. This power can't be used if Snorlax is already Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Vaporeon
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage; if tails, this attack does 10 damage.
Attack2Text: Does 30 damage plus 10 more damage for each Water Energy attached to Vaporeon but not used to pay for this attack's Energy cost. Extra Water Energy after the 2nd doesn't count.

name: Venomoth
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may change the type of Venomoth to the type of any other Pokemon in play other than Colorless. This power can't be used if Venomoth is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused and Poisoned.

name: Victreebel
Attack1Text: If your opponent has any Benched Pokemon, choose 1 of them and switch it with his or her Active Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon can't retreat during your next turn.

name: Vileplume
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may flip a coin. If heads, remove 1 damage counter from 1 of your Pokemon. This power can't be used if Vileplume is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.
Attack1Text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 40 damage times the number of heads. Vileplume is now Confused (after doing damage).

name: Wigglytuff
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.
Attack2Text: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each of your Benched Pokemon.

Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.
Attack2Text: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each of your Benched Pokemon.

name: Butterfree
Attack1Text: If your opponent has any Benched Pokemon, he or she chooses 1 of them and switches it with the Defending Pokemon. (Do the damage before switching the Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: Remove a number of damage counters from Butterfree equal to half the damage done to the Defending Pokemon (after applying Weakness and Resistance) (rounded up to the nearest 10).

name: Dodrio
AbilityText: As long as Dodrio is Benched, pay Colorless less to retreat your Active Pokemon.
Attack1Text: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on Dodrio.

name: Exeggutor
Attack1Text: Switch Exeggutor with 1 of your Benched Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Flip a number of coins equal to the number of Energy attached to Exeggutor. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

name: Fearow
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, during your opponent's next turn, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to Fearow.

name: Gloom
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.
Attack2Text: Both the Defending Pokemon and Gloom are now Confused (after doing damage).

name: Lickitung
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

name: Marowak
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.
Attack2Text: Search your deck for a Fighting Basic Pokemon card and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward. (You can't use this attack if your Bench is full.)

name: Nidorina
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

name: Parasect
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.

name: Persian
Attack2Text: If the Defending Pokemon attacks Persian during your next turn, any damage done by the attack is reduced by 10 (after applying Weakness and Resistance). (Benching either Pokemon ends this effect.)

name: Primeape
Attack1Text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, Primeape is now Confused (after doing damage).

name: Rapidash
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 10 more damage; if tails, this attack does 20 damage.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, during your opponent's next turn, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to Rapidash.

name: Rhydon
Attack2Text: Rhydon does 20 damage to itself. If your opponent has any Benched Pokemon, he or she chooses 1 of them and switches it with the Defending Pokemon. (Do the damage before switching the Pokemon. Switch the Pokemon even if Rhydon is knocked out.)

name: Tauros
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 10 more damage; if tails, this attack does 20 damage.
Attack2Text: Does 20 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on Tauros. Flip a coin. If tails, Tauros is now Confused (after doing damage).

name: Weepinbell
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

name: Bellsprout
Attack2Text: Search your deck for a Basic Pokemon named Bellsprout and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward. (You can't use this attack if your Bench is full.)

name: Cubone
Attack1Text: If the Defending Pokemon attacks Cubone during your opponent's next turn, any damage done by the attack is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance). (Benching either Pokemon ends this effect.)
Attack2Text: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on Cubone.

name: Eevee
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon can't attack Eevee during your opponent's next turn. (Benching either Pokemon ends this effect.)
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage; if tails, this attack does 10 damage.

name: Exeggcute
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.
Attack2Text: Unless all damage from this attack is prevented, you may remove 1 damage counter from Exeggcute.

name: Jigglypuff
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.

name: Mankey
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may look at one of the following: the top card of either player's deck, a random card from your opponent's hand, or one of either player's Prizes. This power can't be used if Mankey is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

name: Meowth
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, draw a card.

name: Nidoran ♀
Attack1Text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.
Attack2Text: Search your deck for a Basic Pokemon named Nidoran ♂ or Nidoran ♀ and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward. (You can't use this attack if your Bench is full.)

name: Oddish
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
Attack2Text: Search your deck for a Basic Pokemon named Oddish and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward. (You can't use this attack if your Bench is full.)

name: Paras
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.

name: Pikachu
Attack1Text: If your opponent has any Benched Pokemon, choose 1 of them and this attack does 10 damage to it. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Rhyhorn
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon can't attack Rhyhorn during your opponent's next turn. (Benching either Pokemon ends this effect.)

name: Spearow
Attack2Text: If Spearow was attacked last turn, do the final result of that attack on Spearow to the Defending Pokemon.

name: Venonat
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
Attack2Text: Remove a number of damage counters from Venonat equal to the damage done to the Defending Pokemon (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
